page.title: 09A TYPICAL SATURDAY,CONNEL
page.content: 1I get up at 1100.I get dressed and my dog and I go to the village shop for the paper.I take 20p for the paper and an extra 13p for a packet of crisps. When I get home I have beans on toast and then I go up the back road on my bike.I get back about 1400 and have a biscuit and watch a film on television until 1700.I then have my tea which is usually a pie,chips and ravioli and I always have Barrs Iron Bru followed by ice cream,peaches and pears.I let my meal digest while I watch the A Team. My Mum watches Dynasty and my Dad goes for a pint.I go to bed at 2300 and fall asleep as soon as my head hits the pillow.
